===Etymology===
Translation of {{der|zh|sa|प्रज्ञाचक्षुस्||eye of understanding; eye of wisdom}} or {{der|zh|pi|paññācakkhu||[[idem]]}}. Tibetan equivalent is {{m|bo|ཤེས་རབ་ཀྱི་སྤྱན||eye of wisdom}}.
